folder.name: FMXISAlphaNum
folder.tiptext: Event generated when numeric value or alphanumeric string is larger than what can fit in the display (for numbers, to the left of the decimal point).

string.name: numDigs
string.tiptext: Number of characters.

string.name: val
string.tiptext: A getter/setter property used to set and retrieve the display's value.

string.name: leftJust
string.tiptext: If true, the alphanumeric string is left justified, otherwise (default) it is right justified.

folder.name: FMXISBar
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple bar plot.

folder.name: FMXISBarrelDial
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple barrel dial that displays positive integer values.

string.name: showBkgnd
string.tiptext: Whether or not to display the background graphic.

string.name: rollUp
string.tiptext: Whether the dial increases by rolling up (true) or down (false).

string.name: digTint
string.tiptext: Color of each digit.

string.name: numDigs
string.tiptext: Number of digits.

string.name: display
string.tiptext: Whether or not to display the digit value.

string.name: evtOverflow
string.tiptext: Event name for event generated if the value of the display (whole number) exceeds the number of positions.

string.name: val
string.tiptext: A getter/setter property used to set or retrieve the value of the dial.

string.name: setColor
string.tiptext: Sets the tint color of the digits to the given color.

string.name: onOverflow
string.tiptext: This component generates an event named

folder.name: FMXISBase
folder.tiptext: Components call this method when they want to generate an event.

string.name: addListener
string.tiptext: Register the listener programmatically to receive all events for this component.

string.name: removeListener
string.tiptext: Remove the listener from this component's event notification list.

folder.name: FMXISButton
folder.tiptext: Event generated when user moves the cursor from the button's hit area to away from the hit area while holding the left mouse button down.

string.name: showHand
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether or not to display the hand cursor when the cursor is over the hit area of this component.

string.name: evtReleaseOutside
string.tiptext: Event name of onReleaseOutside event.

string.name: evtRelease
string.tiptext: Event name of onRelease event.

string.name: evtRollOver
string.tiptext: Event name of onRollOver event.

string.name: evtPress
string.tiptext: Event name of onPress event.

string.name: evtRollOut
string.tiptext: Event name of onRollOut event.

string.name: evtDragOut
string.tiptext: Event name of onDragOut event.

string.name: execEvent
string.tiptext: This method is used to programmatically invoke an action of the component based on the event passed in.

string.name: onRollOver
string.tiptext: Called to invoke action of passing the cursor over the button's hit area.

string.name: onRollOut
string.tiptext: Called to invoke action of passing the cursor away from the button's hit area.

string.name: onReleaseOutside
string.tiptext: Called to invoke action of releasing the button when the cursor has moved outside the hit area.

string.name: onDragOut
string.tiptext: Called to invoke action of passing passing the cursor outside the hit area while the left mouse button is down.

string.name: onRelease
string.tiptext: Called to invoke action of releasing the button when the cursor is over the hit area.

string.name: onPress
string.tiptext: Called to invoke action of pressing the button.

string.name: onPress
string.tiptext: This class implements a simple momentary push button.

folder.name: FMXISButtonMomentary
folder.tiptext: This class extends FMXISButtonRepeater (momentary button with repeat-on-down functionality) to allow developers to swap out the button graphics dynamically, based on specified linkage ID's of the graphics.

string.name: UpLinkID
string.tiptext: Allows the developer at initialization or at run-time to change the up position visual for the button.

string.name: DownLinkID
string.tiptext: Allows the developer at initialization or at run-time to change the down (depressed) position visual for the button.

folder.name: FMXISButtonMomentaryLabel
folder.tiptext: This class extends FMXISButtonMomentary (momentary button with repeat-on-down functionality) to allow developers to add a text label placed over the button.

folder.name: FMXISButtonRepeater
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple momentary push button that is capable of generating repeated, button down events (onPress) given a waiting period and frequency.

folder.name: FMXISButtonToggle
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple toggle button.

string.name: butIsUp
string.tiptext: Whether the button is in the up (unset) position -- true -- on first viewing, or in the down (set) position -- false.

string.name: evtSet
string.tiptext: Event name for when button is put in the set (down) position.

string.name: execEvent
string.tiptext: This method is used to programmatically invoke an action of the component based on the event passed in.

string.name: onPress
string.tiptext: Called to invoke action of pressing the button.

string.name: onSet
string.tiptext: Event generated when button goes from the down to up position.

folder.name: FMXISDigits
folder.tiptext: Event generated when numeric value is larger (whole numbers) than what can fit in the display to the left of the decimal point.

string.name: showBkgnd
string.tiptext: Whether or not to display the background graphic.

string.name: leadZero
string.tiptext: Boolean property true or false, whether or not to pad left of decimal point with 0's.

string.name: decPl
string.tiptext: A getter/setter property used to set and retrieve the number of decimal places (to the right of the decimal point).

string.name: digTint
string.tiptext: Color of each digit.

string.name: numDigs
string.tiptext: Number of digits.

string.name: display
string.tiptext: Whether or not to display the digit value.

string.name: evtOverflow
string.tiptext: Event name for event generated if the value of the display (whole number) exceeds the number of positions to the left of the decimal point.

string.name: val
string.tiptext: A getter/setter property used to set and retrieve the digital display's value.

string.name: onOverflow
string.tiptext: This class implements a simple digital display (positive and negative numbers, as integers or floating point). Users can change the appearance by modifying: defDigBkgnd - background defDigGfx - clip with digits used defDigDecPt - decimal point graphic defDigPlusBkgnd - movie clip that contains digits, background, and decimal point The class has one event --

folder.name: FMXISJog
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple jog.

string.name: incrJog
string.tiptext: Increase the jog by 1 unit.

string.name: incrVal
string.tiptext: Increments the jog by incr units (positive or negative).

string.name: execEvent
string.tiptext: Given an event string and value that matches what this component would generate, perform the action.

string.name: decrJog
string.tiptext: Decrease the jog by 1 unit.

string.name: onValChg
string.tiptext: Event generated when jog knob value has changed.

folder.name: FMXISJoystick
folder.tiptext: Event generated when the joystick has returned to the center position.

string.name: maxVal
string.tiptext: Maximum value for the vector coordinates when the joystick is at full extension.

string.name: evtJReturned
string.tiptext: The event name for the joystick

string.name: forceInt
string.tiptext: Whether or not the vector values generated in joystick events should be rounded to integers.

string.name: centerEPS
string.tiptext: Any value less than this is considered zero.

string.name: kSticky
string.tiptext: Coefficient (between 0 and 1, inclusive) that determines how slowly the joystick returns to center once released.

string.name: evtJReleased
string.tiptext: The event name for the event generated when the user releases the joystick.

string.name: showHand
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether or not to display the hand cursor when the cursor is over the hit area of this component.

string.name: evtJStart
string.tiptext: The event name for the joystick

string.name: evtJChg
string.tiptext: The event name for the joystick value change event.

string.name: pulseFreq
string.tiptext: Frequency of events generated when the joystick is away from center position.

string.name: getVec
string.tiptext: Returns the vector position of the joystick, in an object with x and y properties.

string.name: moveHS
string.tiptext: Initialize moving of hot spot.

string.name: execEvent
string.tiptext: This method is used to programmatically invoke an action of the component based on the event passed in.

string.name: stopMoveHS
string.tiptext: Stop tracking movement of the joystick.

string.name: setVec
string.tiptext: Sets the joystick to the given vector.

folder.name: FMXISKeypad
folder.tiptext: This class implements a keyboard arranged in a grid.

string.name: keyOffset
string.tiptext: Which index should be first displayed in series stored in Up and Down Chars movie clips

string.name: repFreq
string.tiptext: # of millisconds to repeat onKeyDown's, after key has been down holdDur (so long as holdDur is not -1).

string.name: _rows
string.tiptext: Number of rows of keys.

string.name: evtKeyDown
string.tiptext: Name of the on-key-down event sent to listeners when a key is pressed and when it is repeated.

string.name: holdDur
string.tiptext: # of milliseconds after which we repeat key down events.

string.name: _cols
string.tiptext: Number of columns of keys.

string.name: evtKeyUp
string.tiptext: Name of the on-key-up event sent to listeners when a key is released.

string.name: showHand
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether or not to display the hand cursor when the cursor is over the hit area of a key.

string.name: pressKey
string.tiptext: Simulate the pressing of key knum.

string.name: execEvent
string.tiptext: Given an event string and value that matches what this component would generate, perform the action.

string.name: setGrid
string.tiptext: This method is for resetting the grid at runtime to a new grid configuration.

string.name: releaseKey
string.tiptext: Simulate the releasing of key knum.

string.name: onKeyUp
string.tiptext: Event generated when user presses a key, and repeatedly if the key is held down for longer than holdDur milliseconds (repeated at repFreq millisecond frequency). The event value is an object with properties num (index) and char (string character).

folder.name: FMXISLamp
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple three state lamp (indicator).

string.name: tint2
string.tiptext: Color value (RGB) for the second color's tint.

string.name: tint1
string.tiptext: Color value (RGB) for the first color's tint.

string.name: displayLamp
string.tiptext: Three possible values:

folder.name: FMXISLampAttach
folder.tiptext: This class implements a multi-state lamp (indicator) with attached graphics.

folder.name: FMXISPotentiometer
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple potentiometer, which is virtually identical in functionality to the jog knob we implemented (FMXISJog).

string.name: execEvent
string.tiptext: Given an event string and value that matches what this component would generate, perform the action.

string.name: setVal
string.tiptext: Sets the potentiometer value.

folder.name: FMXISProxyListener
folder.tiptext: This class is used to hold a listener instance when the component FMXISBase needs to evaluate the listener at event notification time, rather than at compile-time.

string.name: tline
string.tiptext: Holds the MovieClip instance of the timeline on which the listener is supposed to reside.

string.name: lstner
string.tiptext: Holds the string name of the listener.

folder.name: FMXISRoundDial
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple round dial gauge.

string.name: nXScale
string.tiptext: Scaling factor along the y axis (height) for the needle.

string.name: showBack
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether the background graphic is visible (true) or not (false).

string.name: centerVis
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether the center graphic is visible (true) or not (false).

string.name: val
string.tiptext: Current value of the dial (where needle is set).

string.name: setNumUnits
string.tiptext: Sets the number of units in a full cycle

folder.name: FMXISRoundDialSmooth
folder.tiptext: Event generated when the needle reaches the target value (only after target value has been set using the targVal property).

folder.name: FMXISSectorDial
folder.tiptext: This class implements a simple sector dial.

string.name: centerVis
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether the center graphic is visible (true) or not (false).

string.name: showBack
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether the background graphic is visible (true) or not (false).

string.name: left2right
string.tiptext: Determines whether minimum is on the left (left2right == true) or on the right (left2right == false).

string.name: minVal
string.tiptext: Minimum value of the gauge.

string.name: nXScale
string.tiptext: Scaling factor along the y axis (height) for the needle.

string.name: maxAngle
string.tiptext: Angle of needle when reaches maximum value.

string.name: minAngle
string.tiptext: Angle of needle when reaches minimum value.

string.name: val
string.tiptext: Current value of the dial (where needle is set).

string.name: maxVal
string.tiptext: Maximum value of the gauge.

folder.name: FMXISSectorDialSmooth
folder.tiptext: Event generated when the needle reaches the target value (only after target value has been set using the targVal property).

folder.name: FMXISSlider
folder.tiptext: Event generated when the indicator reaches a new value.

string.name: maxVal
string.tiptext: Maximum value for the slider.

string.name: minVal
string.tiptext: Minimum value for the slider.

string.name: val
string.tiptext: Current slider value.

string.name: gutClicks
string.tiptext: Boolean property saying whether to allow value change on gutter clicks or not.

string.name: numDivs
string.tiptext: Number of divisions, for discrete slider (and tick marks).

string.name: showHand
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether or not to display the hand cursor when the cursor is over the hit area of this component.

string.name: evtChange
string.tiptext: The name of the event.

string.name: showTicks
string.tiptext: Boolean property indicating whether or not to show tick marks.

string.name: setValQuiet
string.tiptext: This method is used to set the indicator value without generating an event.

string.name: execEvent
string.tiptext: Given an event string and value that matches what this component would generate, perform the action.

folder.name: FMXISStopwatch
folder.tiptext: Event generated at a user-controllable interval while the stopwatch is running.

string.name: pulseInt
string.tiptext: This property indicates the interval at which to generate pulse events when the stopwatch is active.

string.name: getTime
string.tiptext: Retrieve the current time of the stopwatch.

string.name: reset
string.tiptext: Reset the stopwatch.

string.name: start
string.tiptext: Activate the stopwatch.

string.name: pause
string.tiptext: Pause the stopwatch.

string.name: isActive
string.tiptext: Use this method to determine if the stopwatch is currently running (returns true) or stopped (false).

string.name: nIters
string.tiptext: Set this value to change the number of times the timer repeats the interval.

string.name: intvl
string.tiptext: Set this value to change the timing interval.

string.name: reset
string.tiptext: Called to reset (and halt, if active) the timer.

string.name: start
string.tiptext: Activate the timer.

string.name: isActive
string.tiptext: This method is used to tell if the timer is currently active.

folder.name: Types
folder.tiptext: Component types that can be used for strong typing
